venue.address_1: 107 South St, Ste 6A (btw South Station & Chinatown)
venue.name: David Buck's Loft

item.description:
Create the Relationship of Your Dreams using the Law of Attraction & The Mastery of Love.


Meghan McChesney Gilroy & Jamie Gilroy are living proof that the Law of Attraction works. Valentine’s Day 2003... Meghan wrote out her vision of her dream man. Two weeks later, she & Jamie went on their first date. In another two week whirlwind, they were married on top of a pyramid in Mexico.

Find out how they manifested their relationship - & what happened after the honeymoon was over.


- For those who are still seeking your dream mate, Meghan & Jamie reveal how to Find Your True Love Now.
- If you’ve Found Love...Now What?, they divulge tools to create a happy, respectful & fulfilling partnership.

***************************************************************
About Meghan McChesney Gilroy & Jamie Gilroy:

Meghan & Jamie are Master Teachers, personally trained by don Miguel Ruiz, international bestselling author of The Four Agreements & The Mastery of Love.
As life coaches & spiritual teachers, they share their wisdom on conscious relationships, mindful parenting, and increasing abundance with individuals & couples through private appointments, teleclasses, seminars & journeys around the US and in Mexico.

***************************************************************
RSVP "YES" ONLY if you know you are coming.
We usually provide handouts & have appetizers & refreshments. So, to keep "green" & cost down, please RSVP "Yes" only when you can honor your commitment & show up. Many of you have been wonderful with this & we very much appreciate your understanding & support!

**************************************************************
For parking and directions (via T or driving) info to Dave's loft :
(1)Go here: http://www.meetup.com...
(2) Sign in
(3) Scroll down and open file "Directions & Parking_BostonLOA Meetup"

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group
